# Getting Started

## Installs

Make sure the following software is installed on your local computer before the workshop. Please contact inbre\@ncgr.org if you have questions.

1. [Zoom](https://zoom.us/download)

Don't plan to use the web version, as this does not have enough features. 

2. [Tabby Terminal](https://tabby.sh/)
Windows: *x64.exe
Mac: arm64

<!--2. [Integrated Genomics Viewer (IGV)](https://software.broadinstitute.org/software/igv/download)-->

<!--3. [MobaXterm](https://mobaxterm.mobatek.net/download.html) (Windows Users Only. Mac or Linux users will use their native terminal)

* Before installing, extract the installer zip folder to any location on your computer.  

* Now run the installer and follow the prompts.-->

3. [Filezilla](https://filezilla-project.org/)

4. Make sure you can access [Pavian](https://fbreitwieser.shinyapps.io/pavian/) at this link: https://fbreitwieser.shinyapps.io/pavian/

Optional: if you prefer to install Pavian on your computer, install R, R studio, and Pavian as outlined below.

| Opt A. [R](https://cran.rstudio.com/) (Latest Version for your OS)

| Opt B. [RStudio](https://rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download)

| Opt C. [Pavian](https://github.com/fbreitwieser/pavian)

| Follow the install instructions on [Pavian's GitHub](https://github.com/fbreitwieser/pavian).  This requires R and R studio to be complete
